# pihole_config_dhcp (Resource)

Manages Pi-hole DHCP server configuration.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "pihole_config_dhcp" "settings" {
  active    = true
  start     = "192.168.1.100"
  end       = "192.168.1.200"
  router    = "192.168.1.1"
  netmask   = "255.255.255.0"
  lease_time = "24h"
}
```

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Manage DHCP server settings
resource "pihole_config_dhcp" "settings" {
  # Enable/disable DHCP
  active = true

  # IP range
  start   = "192.168.1.100"
  end     = "192.168.1.200"
  router  = "192.168.1.1"
  netmask = "255.255.255.0"

  # Lease time
  lease_time = "24h"

  # Optional: IPv6 DHCP
  ipv6         = false
  rapid_commit = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `active` (Boolean) Enable DHCP server.
- `end` (String) End of DHCP address range.
- `ignore_unknown_clients` (Boolean) Ignore unknown clients (only serve known clients).
- `ipv6` (Boolean) Enable IPv6 DHCP (DHCPv6).
- `lease_time` (String) DHCP lease time (e.g., '24h', '1d').
- `logging` (Boolean) Enable DHCP logging.
- `multi_dns` (Boolean) Advertise multiple DNS servers.
- `netmask` (String) Netmask for DHCP.
- `rapid_commit` (Boolean) Enable DHCPv6 rapid commit.
- `router` (String) Router (gateway) IP address.
- `start` (String) Start of DHCP address range.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Identifier for this resource (always 'dhcp').
